com.ociweb.box
Interface BOXDOMDecoder

All Known Implementing Classes:
BOXDOMDecoderImpl
public interface BOXDOMDecoder

Decodes Binary Optimized XML (BOX) into a DOM Document. This is more compact and can be parsed faster than standard XML.

Author:
R. Mark Volkmann, Object Computing, Inc.

Method Summary
 org.w3c.dom.Document decode(java.io.InputStream is)
          Creates a Document from BOX.
